page.title: 09TRAVEL BY ROAD
page.content: Some of our class went out on to the {Kelvedon A12}bridge to do a traffic survey.We counted the traffic passing underneath us.There were lots of lorries and cars(419 vehicles).We also went to {Church St.}The traffic was very much lighter(only 9 vehicles). We took ten minutes in each count.Then we did the{High St.}There were quite a lot of vehicles (68),but not as many as the A12.This is because of the ports in Harwich and Felixstowe which the A12 leads to from London. { } {A12 High St. Church St. {Cars }267 48 6 {Lorries }107 7 2 {Vans }29 1 9 {Buses }10 2 0 {M'Bikes }4 2 0 (chart shows vehicles counted in ten minutes)
